entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:58 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Humidity: 66 %

Wind: WSW 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
